tool_description: This API gives you information about an aircraft. We have collected this data from multiple sources. You get data from multiple sources at once using a single request.
name: Aircraft data simple collection
title: Aircraft data simple collection

api_list.name: getbyhex
api_list.description: get aircraft info by hex number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aircraft-data-simple-collection.p.rapidapi.com/aircraft/424353"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aircraft-data-simple-collection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aircraft-data-simple-collection.p.rapidapi.com/aircraft/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aircraft-data-simple-collection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
